#summary Create a guest user in the TokBox system

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_partner


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||*required*||partnerKey||string||Partner Key of the API Developer who is trying to create the guest account||
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
||400||TBException_InvalidInput||Partner Key does not exist||
||401||InvalidUserAuthException||Access token not found for user={JABBERID}, partner={PARTNERKEY}||
||500||SerializableException||Error contacting jabber server.||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <createGuest>
          <jabberId>guest_###_f4204584b465@jabber-guest.dev.tokbox.com</jabberId>
          <secret>3133cc7d27b9b041523fad2a9c0596ae</secret>
     </createGuest>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/users/createGuest</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="###"/>
     <timer startTime="1217976602.6872" execTime="51.168918609619"/>
</tokResult>
}}}

==Notes==
  * The developer should sign this function with their {PARTNER_SECRET}
